```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(ggiraphExtra)
```

```{r}
nascar <- read_csv("bignessalyssa_LATE_1937_225990_nascar_df-1.csv")

nascar$WinIND <- ifelse( nascar$Wins > 0, 1, 0)


rating_mod <-lm(DriverRating ~ AvgFinish, data = nascar)
summary(rating_mod)

indicator_rating_mod <- lm(DriverRating ~ WinIND + AvgFinish, data = nascar)
summary(indicator_rating_mod)

indicator_rating_mod2 <- lm(DriverRating ~ WinIND + AvgFinish*WinIND, data = nascar)
summary(indicator_rating_mod)


anova(indicator_rating_mod, indicator_rating_mod2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = nascar,
       aes(x = AvgFinish, y = log(DriverRating)))+
  geom_point() # more appropriate for the distribution
```
